startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: URLs to start with. For HTML tables, provide the URL of the page containing the table. For API endpoints or services like ASHA, provide their main URL.

apiToken.title: API Bearer Token
apiToken.description: Optional Bearer token for API authentication. Not required for browser-based APIs like ASHA.

dataSourceType.title: Data Source Type
dataSourceType.description: Specify the type of data source to extract from. If not specified, the actor will attempt to auto-detect.

apiType.title: API/Service Type
apiType.description: For known APIs or services, specify the type to use specialized extraction logic.

extractAllColumns.title: Extract All Columns
extractAllColumns.description: When enabled, extracts all columns from tables. When disabled, only extracts the first three columns.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages to Process
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to process when pagination is available. Set to 0 for unlimited.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: When enabled, saves additional screenshots and logs for debugging purposes.
